headerDisplay: The **SwitchBot** plugin allows you to control SwitchBot Devices. To get started link your SwtichBot account. To get started link your SwtichBot account. 1. Download SwitchBot App on App Store or Google Play Store. 2. Register a SwitchBot account and log in into your account. 3. Generate an Open Token within the App. 4. Input your `Open Token` into the paramter below.
footerDisplay:
Please raise any issues on our [project page](https://github.com/OpenWonderLabs/homebridge-switchbot-openapi/issues).

If you would like to have other SwitchBot Devices added to this plugin fill out [Feature Request Form](https://github.com/OpenWonderLabs/homebridge-switchbot-openapi/issues/new?assignees=&labels=&template=feature_request.md).

[SwitchBot Website](https://www.switch-bot.com)
